hero_badge: ⚡ Transform Your Trading Psychology for Better Results
hero_description: Your completely immersive, AI-powered trading ecosystem where every tool, insight, and psychological support system is perfectly integrated—designed to help you stay centered, focused, and consistently successful in your trading career.
experience_description: ProFitz creates a space where transformation happens naturally, guiding you through a journey of self-discovery and trading mastery.
feature_ai_coach_description: Get personalized coaching sessions powered by advanced AI that understands trading psychology
feature_screenshot_analysis_description: Upload your trading screenshots for AI-powered analysis with market context and emotional insights
feature_market_data_description: Real-time market context and historical data to understand how conditions affect your trading
feature_behavioral_description: Identify and break negative trading patterns while reinforcing profitable behaviors
feature_interactive_exercises_descriptio: Daily mental discipline exercises designed specifically for traders
feature_progress_tracking_description: Comprehensive analytics to track your psychological development and trading improvement
how_it_works_description: Follow our proven 4-step process to develop unshakeable trading discipline
step_1_description: Complete our comprehensive trading psychology assessment to identify your strengths and areas for improvement
step_2_description: Receive a personalized development plan with exercises and coaching sessions tailored to your needs
step_3_description: Engage in daily exercises, AI coaching sessions, and trading analysis to build mental discipline
step_4_description: Achieve consistent profitability through improved emotional control and disciplined decision-making
testimonials_description: See how our platform has transformed trading careers
testimonial_1_description: "The AI coach helped me identify my revenge trading patterns. My consistency improved 300% in just 3 months."
testimonial_2_description: "The trading analysis feature is incredible. It shows me exactly how my emotions affected each trade."
testimonial_3_description: "I finally broke through my profit ceiling. The psychological insights are game-changing."
cta_description: Join thousands of traders who have already mastered their psychology and achieved consistent profitability.

dashboard.psychology_prompt_subtitle: Take our comprehensive assessment for personalized insights
dashboard.psychology_prompt_description: Discover your trading personality, strengths, and areas for improvement.
dashboard.welcome_description: Your trading transformation continues. Today is a new opportunity to grow.
